message: @jorilallo It'll be cool. But as second release. Just to understand if there is enough interest to give to it more time
what images would you use with the mvp?
I want to create an app for iphone that create the images like the ones from http://startupquote.com/post/4064358646 then save them on your phone. Simple.
The user has just to fill the quote, name and subtitle
Sold in the app store at $0.99
Allow people to take their own photos and add sharing to Fb/Twitter
For the MVP just black bg and a cartoon head. Something inspired to http://a4.sphotos.ak.fbcdn.net/hphotos-ak-ash2/75353_163701856997786_148004801900825_351860_8044229_n.jpg
truth to be told I wouldn't pay for it but for creating my own quotes and sharing those...I might (and it might make it viral)
